name: Generic Wave Simulator
description:
The world has been conquered, a plague forced all the drawers to use Cube tools for the rest of humanity and that made everyone stupid,

CUBES EVERYWHERE

 My name is Mc Gregory and i may be the only survivor left on this wasteland, i found a Lab fom Evil Generic Corp, maybe i can find the cure here

A normal person would be afraid for his life, but not me, because im badass as focc

Hey look im so awesome and well detailed character

Ok but i wasn't smart enough to bring a weapon, so i'll pick up one from this box

Have fun, and join my server to help me with the game https://discord.gg/7E9EFvajSy
